name: placenxt
description: PlaceNxt - Get Placed. Get Ahead. An AI-Powered Career Platform for Students

scripts.dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.infra.yml up -d && npm run dev:services
scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev -w @placenxt/api-gateway" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/auth-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/resume-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/scoring-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/skill-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/job-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/application-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/interview-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/validation-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/billing-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/admin-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/recruiter-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/email-tracking-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/media-service"
scripts.dev:local: concurrently "npm run dev -w @placenxt/auth-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/resume-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/scoring-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/skill-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/job-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/application-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/interview-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/validation-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/billing-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/admin-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/recruiter-service" "npm run dev -w @placenxt/email-tracking-service"
scripts.start: npm run start -w @placenxt/database && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start:services" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm run start -w @placenxt/api-gateway" "npm run start -w @placenxt/auth-service" "npm run start -w @placenxt/resume-service" "npm run start -w @placenxt/scoring-service" "npm run start -w @placenxt/skill-service" "npm run start -w @placenxt/job-service" "npm run start -w @placenxt/application-service" "npm run start -w @placenxt/interview-service" "npm run start -w @placenxt/validation-service" "npm run start -w @placenxt/billing-service" "npm run start -w @placenxt/admin-service" "npm run start -w @placenxt/recruiter-service" "npm run start -w @placenxt/email-tracking-service"
scripts.build:shared: npm run build -w @placenxt/database && npm run build -w @placenxt/shared
scripts.build:api-gateway: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/api-gateway
scripts.build:auth-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/auth-service
scripts.build:resume-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/resume-service
scripts.build:scoring-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/scoring-service
scripts.build:skill-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/skill-service
scripts.build:job-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/job-service
scripts.build:application-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/application-service
scripts.build:interview-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/interview-service
scripts.build:validation-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/validation-service
scripts.build:billing-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/billing-service
scripts.build:admin-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/admin-service
scripts.build:recruiter-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/recruiter-service
scripts.build:email-tracking-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/email-tracking-service
scripts.build:media-service: npm run build:shared && npm run build -w @placenxt/media-service
